titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Henry Hardy, in charge at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that Captain Hardy has received reports of acts of piracy near Macraum; it notes that these acts are believed to have been committed by people from Sharga [Sharjah], that prisoners have been taken, and that they are currently being held by Sooltan bin Suggur [Sulṭān bin Saqr].
